trans-unit.source: Represents a window that supports content navigation.
trans-unit.target: 表示支援內容巡覽的視窗。

trans-unit.source: NavigationWindow derives from <xref:System.Windows.Window> and extends it with the ability to navigate to and display content.
trans-unit.target: NavigationWindow 衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Window>及擴充它以巡覽及顯示內容的能力。</xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: Content can be any [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)] object or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)] file.
trans-unit.target: 內容可以是任何[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winfx-md.md)]物件或[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_html](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-html-md.md)]檔案。

trans-unit.source: In general, however, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> object is the preferred way to package content for navigation.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，不過，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>物件是巡覽的套件內容的慣用的方式。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>

trans-unit.source: Content can be navigated to by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A> property with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: 內容可以藉由設定導覽<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A>屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的所需的內容。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, content can be navigated to by using one of the following overloads of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A> method: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%28System.Uri%29> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29> When content is navigated to by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], NavigationWindow will return an object that contains the content.
trans-unit.target: 此外，內容可以瀏覽至使用其中一種的下列多載<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A>方法:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%28System.Uri%29>-<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29>當內容導覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，巡覽視窗將會傳回包含內容的物件。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%28System.Uri%29> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Navigation by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] also supports navigation to a content fragment.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 所瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]也支援導覽至內容片段。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, content can be navigated to by using one of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A> method overloads that accepts an object: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%28System.Object%29> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29> The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigated> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationProgress> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationFailed> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationStopped> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.LoadCompleted> - <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation>.
trans-unit.target: 或者，內容可以瀏覽至使用其中一種<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A>接受物件的方法多載:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%28System.Object%29>-<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29>巡覽的存留期可追蹤透過下列事件:- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigated>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationProgress>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationFailed>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationStopped>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.LoadCompleted>- <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.FragmentNavigation> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.LoadCompleted> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationStopped> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationFailed> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationProgress> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigated> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigating> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%28System.Object%29> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed).
trans-unit.target: 發生巡覽; 每次引發並非所有的事件引發的事件組取決的類型 （內容或內容片段），就會發生的瀏覽和巡覽完成的方式 （取消、 已停止或失敗）。

trans-unit.source: The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events will fire: ![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") During or after a navigation, NavigationWindow provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content being navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A>), the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CurrentSource%2A>), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 下圖說明這些事件將引發順序︰![頁面巡覽流程圖](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "頁面巡覽流程圖")NavigationWindow 期間或之後的導覽，提供所巡覽，包括內容的相關資訊[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]正要巡覽之內容 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A>)、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]目前內容的 (<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CurrentSource%2A>)，並包含所巡覽之內容的物件 (<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CurrentSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: When content is navigated to, NavigationWindow records the navigation as an entry in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 內容瀏覽至時，巡覽視窗會記錄為項目導覽巡覽記錄中。

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A> method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoForward%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 項目加入備份瀏覽歷程記錄，其中一個新的瀏覽發生時，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A>方法，或瀏覽至 向前巡覽記錄中的項目，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoForward%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoForward%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Navigate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoBack%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目向前巡覽記錄瀏覽至的項目在上一步瀏覽歷程記錄，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoBack%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.GoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoBack%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoForward%2A> report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoBack%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoForward%2A>報表是否有後方的項目及向前巡覽記錄，分別。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoForward%2A></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first time that one piece of content is navigated to from another piece of content, NavigationWindow automatically displays a navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] that allows users to navigate back and forwards through navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 第一次的一項內容的瀏覽至時從另一段內容、 巡覽視窗會自動顯示巡覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，可讓使用者瀏覽和巡覽記錄會轉送。

trans-unit.source: You can configure when the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is shown by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ShowsNavigationUI%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]顯示藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ShowsNavigationUI%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ShowsNavigationUI%2A>

trans-unit.source: The most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 向後巡覽記錄中最新的項目可以藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.RemoveBackEntry%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.RemoveBackEntry%2A>移除

trans-unit.source: NavigationWindow does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: NavigationWindow 不會儲存在瀏覽歷程記錄中的內容物件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Instead, NavigationWindow creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，巡覽視窗建立內容物件的新執行個體使用巡覽記錄中巡覽至每一次。

trans-unit.source: This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: 此行為被為了避免過多的記憶體耗用量在巡覽大量內容時。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next.
trans-unit.target: 因此，內容的狀態並不會記住從一個瀏覽至下一步。

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] provides several techniques by which you can store a piece of state for a piece of content in navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 不過，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]提供幾項技術之可以將一段內容的狀態儲存在瀏覽歷程記錄。

trans-unit.source: Using <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A>, you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A>，您也可以記住多重集的單一頁面的執行個體的狀態。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.AddBackEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: NavigationWindow is one of two navigators in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], the other being <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.
trans-unit.target: NavigationWindow 是兩個導覽器中的其中一個[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，其他正在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Frame>

trans-unit.source: Essentially, navigator is a class supports navigation and navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 基本上，導覽是類別支援瀏覽和巡覽記錄。

trans-unit.source: Visually, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] use [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] as a navigator, to provide an integrated user experience.
trans-unit.target: 以視覺化的方式，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]為導覽器，以提供整合的使用者經驗。

trans-unit.source: However, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)] actually use NavigationWindow as the navigator; the <xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A> property of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] running in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)] will return a reference to the NavigationWindow, and the navigation history that is managed by the NavigationWindow is integrated with the navigation history that is managed by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 不過，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xbapsharpplural-md.md)]實際上 NavigationWindow 做為導覽;<xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xbap](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]中執行[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]會傳回 NavigationWindow 的參考和 NavigationWindow 管理的瀏覽歷程記錄由管理的瀏覽歷程記錄與整合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ie7](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-ie7-md.md)]。</xref:System.Windows.Application.MainWindow%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Content Model:** NavigationWindow is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that NavigationWindow can contain content such as text, images, or panels.
trans-unit.target: **內容模型︰** NavigationWindow 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，這表示 NavigationWindow 可以包含如文字、 影像或面板的內容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Also, NavigationWindow is a root element and, consequently, cannot be part of another element's content.
trans-unit.target: 此外，NavigationWindow 根項目，因此，不能是另一個項目內容的一部分。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the content model for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, see [WPF Content Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關內容模型的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，請參閱[WPF 內容模型](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the NavigationWindow Control To apply the same property settings to multiple NavigationWindow controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: NavigationWindow 控制項以自訂適用於多個巡覽視窗控制項使用相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the NavigationWindow, see [NavigationWindow Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和特有之 NavigationWindow 的狀態，請參閱[NavigationWindow 樣式和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in NavigationWindow control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在巡覽視窗控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds an entry to back navigation history that contains a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將備份瀏覽歷程記錄，其中包含的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.AddBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"></xref> object that represents application-defined state that is associated with a specific piece of content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.CustomContentState"> </xref>物件，表示與特定的內容相關聯的應用程式定義狀態。

trans-unit.source: state is , and a object isn't returned from .
trans-unit.target: state是 ，和物件不從傳回。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 加入子物件。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入子物件。

trans-unit.source: when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫此方法。

trans-unit.source: This prevents content from being added to <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> using [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這可防止內容新增至<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Adds text to the object.
trans-unit.target: 將文字加入至物件。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要新增至物件的文字。

trans-unit.source: if the text parameter value contains non-whitespace characters.
trans-unit.target: 如果文字參數值包含非空格字元。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that you use to enumerate the entries in back navigation history for a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>，可用來列舉向後巡覽記錄中的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The entries that are returned by BackStack include whole content, fragment navigations, and custom state.
trans-unit.target: 上一頁堆疊所傳回的項目包含整個內容、 片段巡覽及自訂的狀態。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|BackStack| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 |上一頁堆疊 | |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> if at least one entry has been added to back navigation history, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there are not entries or the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> does not own its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>如果至少一個項目已加入至備份瀏覽歷程記錄，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不是項目或<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>並未擁有它自己的巡覽記錄。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.BackStack*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.BackStack*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.BackStack*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示向後巡覽記錄中是否至少一個項目。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.CanGoBack%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|CanGoBack| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 |CanGoBack | |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is at least one entry in back navigation history; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no entries in back navigation history or the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> does not own its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果沒有至少一個項目中向後巡覽記錄中;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果向後巡覽記錄中沒有任何項目或<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>並未擁有它自己的巡覽記錄。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoBack*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoBack*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoBack*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether there is at least one entry in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出向前巡覽記錄中是否至少一個項目。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|CanGoForward| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 |CanGoForward | |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if there is at least one entry in forward navigation history; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no entries in forward navigation history, or the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> does not own its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果向前巡覽記錄中; 沒有至少一個項目<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果向前巡覽記錄中沒有任何項目或<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>並未擁有它自己的巡覽記錄。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoForward*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoForward*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.CanGoForward*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the content that was last navigated to.
trans-unit.target: 取得[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]之內容的上一次瀏覽至。

trans-unit.source: See CurrentSource.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱 CurrentSource。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the content that was last navigated to, if navigated to by using a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]內容是上一次瀏覽，如果使用導覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that you use to enumerate the entries in back navigation history for a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>，可用來列舉向後巡覽記錄中的項目<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The entries that are returned by ForwardStack include whole content, fragment navigations, and custom state.
trans-unit.target: ForwardStack 所傳回的項目會包含整個內容、 片段巡覽及自訂的狀態。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|ForwardStack| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 |ForwardStack | |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> if at least one entry has been added to forward navigation history, or null if there are no entries or the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> does not own its own navigation history.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>如果至少一個項目具有已經加入至向前巡覽記錄，則為 null，如果沒有任何項目或<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>並未擁有它自己的巡覽記錄。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ForwardStack*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ForwardStack*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ForwardStack*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when navigation to a content fragment begins, which occurs immediately, if the desired fragment is in the current content, or after the source [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] content has been loaded, if the desired fragment is in different content.
trans-unit.target: 導覽至內容片段開始時，立即發生所需的片段是否在目前內容中，或來源之後，就會發生[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]已載入內容，如果想要的片段位在不同的內容。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the most recent item in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 巡覽至最新的項目在上一步瀏覽歷程記錄。

trans-unit.source: GoBack is called when there are no entries in back navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 向後巡覽記錄中沒有任何項目時，會呼叫 GoBack。

trans-unit.source: Navigates to the most recent item in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽至 向前巡覽記錄中的最新項目。

trans-unit.source: GoForward is called when there are no entries in forward navigation history.
trans-unit.target: GoForward 是在向前巡覽記錄中沒有任何項目時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when content that was navigated to has been loaded, parsed, and has begun rendering.
trans-unit.target: 發生於所巡覽的內容已載入，剖析，並開始呈現。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.LoadCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to content that is contained by an object.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式巡覽至物件所包含的內容。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the content to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>包含瀏覽至內容。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未取消瀏覽。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to content that is specified by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式巡覽至所指定的內容[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)] can be either relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)]可為相對或絕對。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 中的組件 Uri](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>物件使用初始化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的所需的內容。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未取消瀏覽。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to content that is contained by an object, and passes an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式巡覽至所包含的物件，並傳遞物件，其中包含要用於資料處理期間瀏覽內容。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Object%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the content to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>包含瀏覽至內容。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object> that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object>，其中包含要用於巡覽期間處理的資料。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未取消瀏覽。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Navigates asynchronously to source content located at a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)], and pass an object that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: 以非同步方式巡覽至位於來源內容[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]，並傳遞物件，包含要用於巡覽期間處理的資料。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigate%28System.Uri%2CSystem.Object%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> object initialized with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the desired content.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>物件使用初始化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的所需的內容。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object> that contains data to be used for processing during navigation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object>，其中包含要用於巡覽期間處理的資料。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a navigation is not canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未取消瀏覽。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the content that is being navigated to has been found, and is available from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property, although it may not have completed loading.
trans-unit.target: 當所巡覽的內容已經找到，且可從<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>屬性，但它可能尚未完成載入。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new navigation is requested.
trans-unit.target: 要求新的瀏覽時，就會發生。

trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Navigating?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an error is raised while navigating to the requested content.
trans-unit.target: 導覽至要求的內容時，會引發錯誤時發生。

trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationFailed?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs periodically during a download to provide navigation progress information.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供導覽進度資訊下載期間定期發生。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationProgress?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"></xref> that is used by this <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> to provide navigation services to its content.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService"> </xref> ，會由這<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>提供瀏覽其內容的服務。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> uses a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> to provide navigation services to content that is hosted by <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>用<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>來瀏覽服務提供給<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>所裝載的內容</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: The NavigationService property is useful for code in a custom <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> to get a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>, to handle navigation events, for example.
trans-unit.target: NavigationService 屬性可用於自訂的程式碼<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>取得參考<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>來處理巡覽事件，例如。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: Content that is hosted by a <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>, should use the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to get a reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>.
trans-unit.target: 內容是由裝載<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page>，應該使用的<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性取得的參考至<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page.NavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.GetNavigationService%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Page> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: The navigation service used by this <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 使用此瀏覽服務<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.StopLoading*> method is called, or when a new navigation is requested while a current navigation is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.StopLoading*>呼叫方法時，或新的瀏覽要求時進行目前的瀏覽時。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.StopLoading*>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.NavigationStopped?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Called when the template generation for the visual tree is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立的視覺化樹狀結構的範本產生時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Window.Closed"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Window.Closed"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: OnClosed releases the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService> object that it is using to manage navigation, before raising <xref:System.Windows.Window.Closed> event.
trans-unit.target: OnClosed 釋放<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>物件，它會使用管理巡覽，引發之前<xref:System.Windows.Window.Closed>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Window.Closed> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件資料。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.NavigationWindowAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.NavigationWindowAutomationPeer"></xref>這個物件<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.NavigationWindowAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.NavigationWindowAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reloads the current content.
trans-unit.target: 重新載入目前的內容。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Refresh%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Removes the most recent journal entry from back history.
trans-unit.target: 移除後的歷程記錄中的最新的日誌項目。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.RemoveBackEntry%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The most recent <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry"></xref> in back navigation history, if there is one.
trans-unit.target: 最近<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.JournalEntry"></xref>中向後巡覽記錄，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> isolates external [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content within a partial trust security sandbox (with default Internet zone permission set).
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>隔離外部[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]部分信任安全性沙箱內容 （使用預設網際網路區域權限集合）。

trans-unit.source: External content is [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] content that is not included with an application as either a resource file or a content file (for more information, see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)).
trans-unit.target: 外部內容是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]並未隨附於應用程式資源檔案或內容檔案的內容 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 應用程式資源、 內容和資料檔案](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md))。

trans-unit.source: When SandboxExternalContent is true, and the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> is an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the content is loaded into a partial trust security sandbox that is limited to the default Internet zone permission set.
trans-unit.target: 當 SandboxExternalContent 會為 true，而且內容<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>為外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案，將內容載入至僅限於預設部分信任安全性沙箱，網際網路區域權限集合。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the external content is loaded into a separate process.
trans-unit.target: 此外，外部內容會以不同的處理序載入。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the external content becomes isolated and does not have access to application-scope resources, such as resource dictionaries (for more information, see <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>).
trans-unit.target: 因此，外部內容會變成隔離，而且沒有應用程式範圍的資源，例如資源字典的存取權 (如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>)。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> contains external content only when the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A> property is set to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>包含外部內容時，才<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A>屬性設定為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> content that is provided using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property is considered internal content and, subsequently, is not isolated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>使用提供的內容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性會被視為內部內容，而且此後，不隔離。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|SandboxExternalContent| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 |SandboxExternalContent | |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if content is isolated within a partial trust security sandbox; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果內容是放在部分信任安全性沙箱。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: SandboxExternalContent is set when an application is executing in partial trust.
trans-unit.target: 在部分信任中執行應用程式時，會設定 SandboxExternalContent。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.SandboxExternalContent*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.SandboxExternalContent*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.SandboxExternalContent*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*> property should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>屬性必須永續性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content*>

trans-unit.source: This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property does not have a simple default value.
trans-unit.target: 這`ShouldSerialize`方法提供，因為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。

trans-unit.source: You typically call this method if you are either developing a designer for the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> or developing your own control incorporating the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您開發的設計工具<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>或開發您自己的 control 納入<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow></xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>通常呼叫這個方法

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property value has changed from its default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果屬性值已經從其預設值;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref> shows its navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow"></xref>顯示其導覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: To aid back and forward navigation, <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> automatically displays a navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is displayed whether or not navigation has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 若要用以協助後和向前巡覽，<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>會自動顯示 瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]會顯示是否發生巡覽。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|ShowsNavigationUI| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 |ShowsNavigationUI | |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigation [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果巡覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]顯示; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ShowsNavigationUI*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ShowsNavigationUI*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.ShowsNavigationUI*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the current content, or the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of new content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]的目前內容中，或[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]目前所巡覽的新內容。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.Source%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)] can be either relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri#initcap#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-urisharpinitcapsharpplural-md.md)]可為相對或絕對。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 中的組件 Uri](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|Source| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 |來源 | |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] for the current content, or the content that is currently being navigated to.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]目前的內容，或目前所巡覽的內容。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.Source*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Stops further downloading of content for the current navigation request.
trans-unit.target: 會停止進一步下載目前的瀏覽要求的內容。

trans-unit.source: StopLoading stops the download of the requested content, and causes the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationStopped> event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: StopLoading 停止下載要求的內容，並會導致<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationStopped>會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow.NavigationStopped>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.StopLoading%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base uniform resource identifier (URI) of the current context.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前內容的基底統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext>介面。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext> </xref:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow>

trans-unit.source: The base URI of the current context.
trans-unit.target: 目前內容的基底 URI。
